data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 27,753 believers in Kannur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kannur, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Kannur, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 27,753 believers in the county of Kannur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Kannur, Kerala, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Chakkan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, encourage the 27,753 believers in Kannur to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 2,464,635 lost people in  Kannur, Kerala, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kannur, Kerala, India has a population of 2,523,000.

We estimate Kannur has 27,753 people who might know Jesus, 30,612 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,464,635 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Kannur, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
